20101203023639.500|20101203023642.000|CCO|FUND-RAISING MADE HIS CASE ONE 
20101203023642.000|20101203023644.000|CCO|MORE TIME. 
20101203023644.000|20101203023646.000|CCO|>> I TAKE FULL CREDIT AND -- 
20101203023646.000|20101203023648.000|CCO|FOR THE RESPONSIBILITY OF THAT.
